title: Freedom4All
author: Freedom4All
created_time: October 09, 2023, 06:31:09 PMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 01:38:51 PM by Freedom4All
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community,I hope everyone is doing well. I find myself in a situation where I need a mini loan of 0.0018 BTC for a small, but very, time-sensitive payment. Loan Details:Amount Needed: 0.0018 BTCRepayment Amount: 0.0020 BTCRepayment Date: Within 48 hours from the time the loan is received.Why Trust Me? Or collateral?/I think it will work out here and an added benefit is that my reputation here will improve as well after repaying the loan. I understand that trust is a valuable commodity here, and I'm willing to discuss any additional terms or verification methods, that are reasonable for this loan, you might require.If you're interested in helping me out, please reply to this thread or send me a private message so I can provide you with what is considered good collateral for this small loan. I own an established website which adds another layer of credibility to my online presence.BTCest regards!

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.created_time: October 09, 2023, 10:51:01 PMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 01:07:19 AM by Freedom4All
comments.body: This issue has been resolved, assistance was provided through external channels, outside the forum. But thanks to that I was able to ask for a small favor over here without getting roasted. (yet)EDIT:A bit of background: A very beloved person wanted to have a magic mushroom experience just once in her life. She doesn't live in the ideal location and isn't in the ideal circumstances to have such an experience. However, it was successful, and so far, her experiences have been very positive.
